title.rendered: Hiring Part-Time Sales Associate + 20% OFF Toys in October

content.rendered:
Employment Opportunity: Part-Time Sales Associate at Gottwals Books

Do you want to work with a team of passionate, book-loving, hard-working folks who care about people and love what they do? Well, you’re in luck! We have an opening at our Macon store for a part-time sales associate. Previous bookstore experience is preferred but not required. Most days would be spent at the Macon store, but flexibility is a must in case you are needed at one of the other locations periodically. Send resumes to service@gottwalsbooks.com.

Just a Little Thursday Morning Fun!

Melissa & Doug® Role Playing Costumes!

Halloween is just around the corner and Gottwals Books in Perry has a great selection of role playing costumes for 20% off! Bring your kids & find the perfect outfit that they can play in all year long.

Gottwals Books: 20% OFF Toys in October!
